naslov: BAČVICE // LUKSUZNA VILA SA BAZENOM / video / čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: Luksuzna duplex vila sa na Bačvicama – Idealna prilika za uživanje u blizini plaže i mora! Uživajte u sunčanju na prostranom dvorištu uz bazen i jacuzzi. - ekskluzivna nekretnina agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina.Agencija je u sustavu pdv-a te se na sve usluge obračunava pdv. Ova prekrasna duplex vila smještena je na Bačvicama, u neposrednoj blizini plaže i mora. Sagrađena 1962. godine, vila je potpuno rekonstruirana, adaptirana i uređena 2019. godine od strane etabliranog arhitekta. Smještena je među bujnim mediteranskim raslinjem, pružajući vam osjećaj privatnosti i mira. Opremljena je brendiranim namještajem i opremom, pružajući vrhunski luksuz i udobnost. NAPOMENA: detaljni video, slike i lokaciju šaljemo na upit! DETALJI VILE: + Četiri etaže: Vila se sastoji od četiri etaže, pružajući obilje prostora za udoban život ili luksuzni turistički najam. + Suterenski prostor: U suterenu se nalazi biljar sala, kino dvorana, vinoteka, kuhinja i spavaća soba s kupatilom. + Iz suterena izlazite na terasu s bazenom i jacuzzijem. + Visoko prizemlje: Ovdje se nalazi komforan dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, kupatilo i spremište. Balkon iz dnevnog boravka vodi na terasu/dvor s bazenom i jacuzziem, a kroz kuhinju se izlazi na natkrivenu terasu. + Prvi kat: Tri komforne spavaće sobe s balkonima i djelomičnim pogledom na more, spremište te dva kupatila sa saunom. + Drugi kat: Master spavaća soba sa garderobom i uredom s panoramskim pogledom na more. Ukupna površina: Vila ima sveukupno 370 m2 stambenog prostora + terase i garaža, smještenu na okućnici od 332 m2. Dodatni sadržaji: Centralno grijanje u cijelom objektu, podno grijanje u kupatilima, video nadzor i alarmni sustav. Lokacija: Vila se nalazi u mirnom dijelu Bačvica, što budućem vlasniku pruža idealno okruženje za miran i ugodan život ili investiciju u luksuzni turistički najam. Za više detalja i informacija, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. Ova vila je prava prilika za one koji žele uživati u luksuznom životu uz more! - cijena 3 000 000 eura eng................................................ ...................................................... Luxury duplex villa in Bačvice - An ideal opportunity to enjoy near the beach and the sea! Enjoy sunbathing on the spacious yard next to the pool and jacuzzi. - exclusive property of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + vat of the sales price Dear clients, viewing of the property is only possible with a signed mediation agreement, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on mediation in real estate transactions. This beautiful duplex villa is located in Bačvice, in the immediate vicinity of the beach and the sea. Built in 1962, the villa was completely reconstructed, adapted and decorated in 2019 by an established architect. It is located among lush Mediterranean vegetation, providing you with a sense of privacy and peace. It is equipped with branded furniture and equipment, providing ultimate luxury and comfort. NOTE: detailed video, pictures and location are sent upon request! VILLA DETAILS: + Four floors: The villa consists of four floors, providing plenty of space for comfortable living or a luxury tourist rental. + Basement space: In the basement there is a billiard hall, a cinema hall, a wine cellar, a kitchen and a bedroom with a bathroom. + From the basement you can access the terrace with a swimming pool and jacuzzi. + High ground floor: Here there is a comfortable living room with kitchen and dining room, bathroom and storage room. The balcony from the living room leads to a terrace/courtyard with a swimming pool and jacuzzi, and through the kitchen there is access to a covered terrace. + First floor: Three comfortable bedrooms with balconies and a partial view of the sea, a storage room and two bathrooms with a sauna. + Second floor: Master bedroom with wardrobe and office with panoramic sea view. Total area: The villa has a total of 370 m2 of living space + terrace and garage, located on a plot of 332 m2. Additional features: Central heating throughout the building, underfloor heating in the bathrooms, video surveillance and alarm system. Location: The villa is located in a quiet part of Bačvici, which provides the future owner with an ideal environment for a peaceful and pleasant life or an investment in a luxury tourist rental. For more details and information, feel free to contact us. This villa is a real opportunity for those who want to enjoy a luxurious life by the sea! - price 3 000 000 euro #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
